name: Jordan Airline Training and Simulation (JATS)
about: Jordan Airline Training and Simulation (JATS) is a premier aviation training center in the MENA region, offering comprehensive training programs for cockpit, cabin crew, and aviation technical professionals. With over 50 years of experience, JATS provides high-quality training solutions, including type rating training, maintenance courses approved by EASA Part 147 and JCARC, and cabin crew safety training. The facility features 6 full-flight simulators, CBT labs, and a range of training devices. JATS ensures a pleasant training experience with scheduling assistance, hotel accommodations, free transportation, and a warm welcome. Known for its professional and friendly hospitality, JATS is strategically located in Amman, Jordan, serving both local and international airline industries effectively.
